parserpower-error:
Used when an error message is included.

Parameters:
* $1 - source parser function name
* $2 - error message
parserpower-error-invalid-argument-numbe:
An error message.

Parameters:
$1 - number of parameters per template call
parserpower-error-missing-parameter:
An error message.

Parameters:
$1 - a parameter name
parserpower-duplicate-args-category:
{{tracking category name}}
Tracking category for pages using duplicate arguments in ParserPower functions
parserpower-duplicate-args-category-desc: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|parserpower-duplicate-args-category}} tracking category.
